name: My Love Match
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this cute matching game, featuring two different and addictive love themed modes. Use angelic power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

+ Love theme with lots of cute graphics
+ Two uniquely different modes; Arcade and Zen
+ Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master
+ Angelic power ups
+ Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really the champion!
+ Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves
